entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 this evening then light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon.
